      • getLocalSharedFiles

        public FileInfo[] getLocalSharedFiles()
        Obtain metadata info of files on this peer's shared folder. The list is returned as a FileInfo array, which can be directly passed as input argument to make the initial ADD_SEED request when connecting to tracker.
        Returns:
        An array of FileInfo containing the metadata of each file.
